data.name: Asahi Super Dry
data.description: Fresh, crisp and clear - with a sharp delivery that slakes thirst before slipping gently on.

available.name: Year Round
available.description: Available year round as a staple beer.

style.name: Dry Lager
style.description: This straw-colored lager lacks sweetness, is light in body, and is only mildly flavored by malt. Its alcoholic strength may contribute to the overall flavor character. Bitterness is low and carbonation is high. Chill haze, fruity esters, and diacetyl should be absent.

data.name: Baron Von Fruhling
data.description: This springtime beer brewed with German Hallertau blanc hops processed at Hop Head Farms is like two beers in one. Aromas of grapefruit, honey, and pineapple suggest a tropical fruit cup—yet it tastes and finishes clean and dry, with an unaggressive bitter finish.

style.name: Dry Lager

breweries.name: Pleasant House Brewing Company
breweries.description:
Pleasant House Brewing Company is an independently owned microbrewery focusing on small-batch, true-to-style beers, especially traditional UK styles.

The original Pleasant House is an 1800s cottage that still looks out on the rolling green hills of rural Yorkshire, England. In the 1950s and ’60s, the Jackson family called Pleasant House home. Today, it is the inspiration behind husband and wife team Art and Chelsea Jackson’s Pleasant House restaurants and microbrewery. Our beers pair brilliantly with our award-winning, savory Royal Pies and other British-inspired, locally sourced specialties.

All of our microbrews are crafted on the premises in our historic 1887 building in Three Oaks, Michigan.

Sun:  12:00pm - 8:00pm

Hours reflect kitchen and bar availability; limited bar hours thereafter.

Please note hours are Eastern Standard Time.

data.name: Charlie Wells Dry Hopped Lager
data.description:
Our Master Brewers have poured the company’s 139 year heritage into crafting a new lager, using its founder’s roots travelling the world in the Merchant Navy as inspiration. Charlie Wells Dry Hopped Lager is brewed with natural mineral water from a well sunk by Charles Wells himself in the early 1900s and the brewers combine several varieties of hops from around the world to create the beer’s slight bitterness, hoppy aroma and subtle maltiness with a deliciously smooth finish.

Brewed in true continental style, we use 100% malt in the mash and add in Target hops followed by a late addition of Styrian Goldings to add that really noble hop aroma. We ferment the beer cool with lager yeast for seven days, and what makes this beer really special is a two week cold conditioning stage with Australian Galaxy and Ella hops which brings out all that depth of flavour and dry hop character.

breweries.name: Wells and Young's Brewing Company
breweries.description:
Wells and Young's Brewing Company is the epitome of all-round business excellence, demonstrating sustained growth for its beers and stockists whilst combining traditional family values with innovation and development. 

Firmly placed as the UK's largest private brewing company, it is fiercely independent, and with an enviable portfolio of some of the UK's most loved cask beers and speciality lager brands.

data.name: El Gordo Barracho
data.description: A spiced Mexican lager! Made with corn and a unique California lager yeast, this beer is fermented clean then racked into a secondary with a special blend of rare Mexican chilies and cumin. Should be a classic pairing with the Calexico food cart!

style.name: Dry Lager

breweries.name: Sixpoint Brewery
breweries.description:
Sixpoint Craft Ales was founded in 2004 by Shane Welch, a former homebrewer that originally grew up in Milwaukee. The microbrewery is located in a 7,000-square-foot (650 m2) factory in in Red Hook, Brooklyn that formerly manufactured filing cabinets. Sixpoint began business by only distributing kegs to local bars and restaurants; instead of bottling its beer, filling growlers at bars were the only way for customers to drink the beer at their homes. 

In 2011 Sixpoint launched initial canned  offerings of 16 oz, year-round styles Sweet Action, Bengali Tiger, Righteous Ale and The Crisp.  Further releases have included the 12 oz Resin and 3Beans, as well as 16oz seasonal offerings such as Apollo and Autumnation.

data.name: Ichnusa
data.description: Birra Ichnusa, or simply Ichnusa, is the name of a popular Sardinian-made beer, which is brewed in Assemini, a town near the Sardinian capital Cagliari. It is named after the Latinized ancient name Sardinia, Hyknusa. Birra Ichnusa is a lager with a hoppy taste.

breweries.name: Heineken
breweries.description: Heineken Lager Beer was first brewed by Gerard Adriaan Heineken in 1873. The beer is made of purified water, malted barley, hops, and yeast. In 1886 H. Elion finished the development of the Heineken A-yeast, which is still used in the brewing process today

data.name: Platan kvasnicový
data.description: Kvasnicový Platan (Yeast Platan) is a living lager containing brewer’s yeast, which brings many nourishing substances to the beer. It is a pleasantly bitter and refreshing beer with strong zest and an excellent head.

data.name: Protivínský Granát
data.description: The name of this lager comes from its deep garnet colour. It is a delicately bitter beer with an exclusive zest and a rich head. Its spectrum of tastes, which include, for example, caramel or some malt tastes, as well as its distinctive bitterness, provide an exclusive gourmet experience.
